title: Supreme Commander (video game)
summary: Supreme Commander (sometimes SupCom) is a 2007 real-time strategy video game designed by Chris Taylor and developed by his company, Gas Powered Games. The game is considered to be a spiritual successor, not a direct sequel, to Taylor's 1997 game Total Annihilation,[1] and also the Spring remake.  First announced in the August 2005 edition of PC Gamer magazine,[2] the game was released in Europe on February 16, 2007, and in North America on February 20.
